name: Good Enough (Mikkel Blaase, MontyCo)
description:
Accurate simulation of the wonderful love and care provided by our most LOYAL and hardworking postal service workers.

LMB: Interact

R: Restart level

ESC: Back to menu

Jonas Carvalho 3D Art & SFX

Nathan Stevens: Music

Magnus Isdahl: Concept Art

Monty Corveleyn: Game Design & Programming

Mikkel Garde Blaase: Direction/Integration, Game Design & Programming
